name: Bella Coterie Luxury Silk Pillowcase for Hair and Skin | 30 Momme | 100% Pure 6A Mulberry Silk | Super Soft | Perfectly Plush [Standard, Silver]
about_this_item: FAREWELL FACIAL CREASES-Your skin will glide effortlessly across the ultratight 30 momme weave of our luxurious silk pillowcase, fighting wrinkles while you sleep.
DITCH THE DRY SKIN-Skip cotton or satin covers that steal moisture. Our superiorly soft silk pillowcase helps you retain moisture for the secret to glamorous, glowing skin.

BYE BYE BREAKOUTS-Fight acne while you snooze with the natural amino acids found in pure mulberry silk. Our ultra soft pillowcases, made of natural fibers, won't irritate skin or clog pores. Hello beauty sleep!

NO MORE KNOTTING-Sleek hair starts with your sleep! Proteins in 100% organic silk threads keep your hair moisturized, while the super smooth finish prevents knotting and breakage for effortlessly luscious locks.

THE BC GUARANTEE-Here at BELLA COTERIE we're on a mission to level up your beauty sleep. Treat yourself to our silk pillowcases risk-free for 30 days with our 100% customer satisfaction guarantee. Once you sleep in the lap of luxury, you'll never go back!
